mapper.insert: insert into car(car_id, tire_change_distance, wiper_change_distance, cooler_left, engine_oil_left, distance) values(#{car_id},#{tire_change_distance},#{wiper_change_distance},#{cooler_left},#{engine_oil_left},#{distance})
mapper.update: update car set cooler_left=#{cooler_left} where car_id=#{car_id}
update car set engine_oil_left=#{engine_oil_left} where car_id=#{car_id}
update car set distance=#{distance} where car_id=#{car_id}
